SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tr_user (userName, department_Code, createTime, updateTime, isDeleted) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tr_user set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_Code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userName, department_Code, createTime, updateTime, isDeleted from tr_user
